Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: What do you need your highness?

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text: I am hosting a party tonight and I need my most useless member of the court to invite the village

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: OK, let me go and get Sylvia

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text: No, my 2 month old Daughter would be useless, but I meant you.

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: Oh.. That's flattering, I'm your jester, don't you need me to keep you entertained?

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text: You'll be doing enough of that at the party. Also, you aren't my jester, you're my backup.

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: I'm way more entertaining than Sneako!

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text: That's not true, he's funny, cool and can juggle. You just make passive aggressive comments.

Lines.Speaker: Jane Foole
Lines.Text: Thanks for the feedback! Much appreciated..

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text:
I rest my case. Anyway, we will be having lots of fun and events for all. 
Make sure to invite everyone.

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text:
How could I forget?! We will be voting for our favourite court jester at the party. 
This is your chance to prove you're the better one.

Lines.Speaker: Random Guard
Lines.Text: Don't forget the big beheading too!

Lines.Speaker: King Otto
Lines.Text:
Stop wasting valuable time here! You need to go and invite the town! 
There's only 5 hours until it starts!
